Package smile.data

Interface BinarySparseDataset

All Superinterfaces:
Dataset<int[]>
public interface BinarySparseDataset extends Dataset<int[]>
Binary sparse dataset. Each item is stored as an integer array, which are the indices of nonzero elements in ascending order.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface smile.data.Dataset

    Dataset.Collectors

    Method
    Description
    static BinarySparseDataset
    from(Path path)
    Parse a binary sparse dataset from a file, of which each line is a data item which are the indices of nonzero elements.

    Returns the binary value at entry (i, j) by binary search.

    SparseMatrix

      Returns the binary value at entry (i, j) by binary search.
      Parameters:
      i - the row index.
      j - the column index.
      Returns:
      the binary value of cell.

      SparseMatrix toMatrix()
      Returns the Harwell-Boeing column-compressed sparse matrix.

    • of

      static BinarySparseDataset of(Collection<int[]> data)
      Returns a default implementation of BinarySparseDataset from a collection.
      Parameters:
      data - Each row is a data item which are the indices of nonzero elements. Every row will be sorted into ascending order.
      Returns:
      the sparse dataset.

    • from

      static BinarySparseDataset from(Path path) throws IOException, NumberFormatException
      Parse a binary sparse dataset from a file, of which each line is a data item which are the indices of nonzero elements.
      Parameters:
      path - the input file path.
      Returns:
      the sparse dataset.
      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be read or closed.
      NumberFormatException - if an entry is not an integer.
